item.text:
Welcome!
Slowhunch.com is a new, open source web app and "innovation community" inspired by Steven Johnson's new book entitled, Where Good Ideas Come From . If you haven't already watched his masterful presentation at TED, please do so now (it's right below).


As I announced in this blog post, I'm launching Slowhunch.com to put the principles Steven Johnson talks about into practice. In Good Ideas, he suggests the following:
"...create an open database of hunches, the Web 2.0 version of the traditional suggestion box. A public hunch database make every passing idea visible to everyone else. Others can comment or expand on those ideas, connecting them with their own hunches..."

Slowhunch.com is a new, open source web app and "innovation community" inspired by Steven Johnson's new book entitled, Where Good Ideas Come From.
I'm launching Slowhunch.com to put the principles Steven Johnson talks about into practice.
